SourceString: Cannot create any more Adventure Logs.\nPlease erase an existing Adventure Log to make room for a new one.
Which slot will use to create an Adventure Log?
Please choose an Adventure Log Record to erase.
This Adventure Log cannot be restored afterwards.\nAre you sure?
Please choose a present to receive.
Requirements not met to\nreceive this present.
This Adventure Log cannot\nreceive this present.
This Adventure Log received\nthis present on {Year}/{Month}/{Day}.
This Adventure Log received\nthis present on {Year}/{Month}/{Day}.\nIt cannot be redeemed again.
This Adventure Log cannot receive this present.\nFor you cannot hold any more items.\nReorganize your items in-game, and try again.
